title: Ping Problems
body: Has anyone been experiencing crazy amounts of ping since the start of patch 6.15 for me I ping now ranges from 500-7000 now and other pepole said they also have big ping problems as well as dc'ing

replies.body:
As *Rineyy* mentioned, the connection guide is a great place to start in troubleshooting this issue. Great changes in latency (ping) are typically caused by a shift in how your connection is routed to the server. Some local network configurations can also impact your latency to a server, which is why the guide Rineyy linked is such a good first step. 

If you continue to see issues after working through that guide, please let me know.
